MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L13 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Southgate Road, Prescot Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.03PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.37PM on 6th February 2021.
